title: What is a product design sprint?
description: A Product Design Sprint is a technique to quickly design, prototype, and test the viability of an idea, product, or feature. The design sprint consists of 5 phases (typically days), starting with design thinking and ending with a user-tested prototype.

title: Can you run a design sprint remotely?
description: Yes! By combining the right tools, processes, and planning itâ€™s the way that we now prefer to run sprints.
